hypothesis_discipline_audit.notes: Four hypotheses tested, all refuted/weakened with active falsification. Data governance void hypothesis (H7.1-B) comprehensively refuted with search for governance across structures.
Four hypotheses tested, all refuted with disconfirming evidence actively sought. Meaning stability hypothesis refuted through quantified drift (13-15%).
Four hypotheses tested, all refuted. Data quality uniformity refuted through selective enforcement documentation across domains.
Four hypotheses tested, all refuted. Stewardship completeness refuted through orphaned domain identification (5 domains orphaned).
Four hypotheses tested, all refuted/weakened. Information equality refuted through asymmetry documentation (5 domains, 5 gatekeepers).
Four hypotheses tested, all decisively refuted. Near-real-time data hypothesis refuted through weeks-to-quarters latency documentation (6 domains).

Three hypotheses tested, all refuted. Coherence hypothesis decisively refuted through four major contradictions. Three falsification attempts (DNF-A, DNF-B, DNF-C) conducted searching for coherence evidence, none found.
